author: cms-sw
body:
This includes CMS https://github.com/cms-externals/HLS_arbitrary_Precision_Types/commit/a3c0b0b444984aadba245a3b1fdffacaccea3141 patch on top of https://github.com/Xilinx/HLS_arbitrary_Precision_Types/commit/200a9aecaadf471592558540dc5a88256cbf880f

existing hls-fix.patch is now applied directly in to our fork of HLS_arbitrary_Precision_Types
title: HLS: use patched version of hls from cms-externals
